snippet: Where the president typically waits for a protester to stop and perhaps acknowledges the complaint, Michelle Obama chose direct confrontation.
abstract: Michelle Obama has rare face-off with heckler at Democratic fundraiser before protesting woman, shouting for gay rights, is escorted out by party supporters; Obama left lecturn and moved toward heckler, directly confronting her; approach is starkly different from president, who typically waits for protester to stop and perhaps acknowledges complaint.
lead_paragraph: Where the president typically waits for a protester to stop and perhaps acknowledges the complaint, Michelle Obama chose direct confrontation.

headline.seo: Michelle Obama Confronts Heckler at Fund-Raiser
headline.main: The First Lady Refuses to Let a Heckler Go Unscolded
headline.print_headline: The First Lady Refuses to Let A Heckler Go Unscolded

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
